posts.title: Teens: How To Volunteer Virtually With The Library
posts.text: Give back to your community while earning service hours.

posts.title: Beyond Coming Out: Fantastic Books with LGBT+ Characters
posts.text: Coming out stories, while an essential part of the canon, are just a tiny part of the complicated, beautiful world that is LGBTQ literature.

posts.title: The Bi YA We're Reading after Watching Janelle Monae
posts.text: Janelle Monae’s latest video has us in a bi state of mind here at The New York Public Library. To celebrate, here are some of our favorite YA books featuring bisexual characters.

posts.title: 6 Books to Check Out on National Coming Out Day
posts.text: Happy National Coming Out Day! Much like my experience being out has evolved in the 12 years since I first came out, LGBT literature has also shifted to tell more than just coming out stories. In the spirit of this, here are some great books with LGBTQIA characters that show many different out realities.
